org.jsfml.audio

Interface ConstSoundBuffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Const
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SoundBuffer

    public interface ConstSoundBuffer
extends Const
    Read-only interface for sound buffers.

    It provides methods to can gain information from a sound buffer (such as the duration) and save it to a file.

    Note that this interface is expected to be implemented by a SoundBuffer. It is not recommended to be implemented outside of the JSFML API.

    See Also:
    Const

        Throws:
